summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Osmotics Eye Lash Enhancing Serum - Eyelash & Brow Growth Serum for Fuller, Healthier and Bolder Looking Lashes - Advanced Formula Formulated with Biotin and Natural Growth Peptides for Longer, Thicker and Darker Eyelashes - Nourishes, Conditions, Strengthen, Enhance, Moisturize and Lengthen Natural Lash and Brows Review Date: 2022/02/16 Store: Osmotics Cosmeceuticals Product Description: ['EYELASH GROWTH SERUM - A revolutionary enhancing serum that promotes the appearance of fuller, bolder-looking Lashes. Get healthier and fuller-looking lashes with Osmotics Lash Enhancer Serum. This lash-enhancing serum comes infused with biotin and peptides. The formula nourishes and conditions to promote the appearance of healthier, fuller, and more beautiful-looking lashes. Plus, this lash booster leaves lashes feeling moisturized and longer looking in just 4 weeks. The gentle full lash serum is safe to use around the eyes, just apply it 1-2x daily from root to tip of your lashes. With the included, fine-tip brush applicator, the application is quick and simple.'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Osmotics Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.17 x 2.05 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'O OSMOTICS COSMECEUTICALS'} Review Text: This eyelash serum is really nice. So far I have no issues with it. I will see how this goes after usage. As far as I can tell this is high quality lash serum and I am very excited to use it. This little tube will go a long way. Review Title: So far so good Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SmoothSkin Pure FIT Intelligent Ultrafast IPL Permanent Hair Reduction for Women & Men - Body & Face – FDA Cleared Review Date: 2022/03/13 Store: SMOOTHSKIN Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.6 x 2.5 x 7.2 inches; 2.62 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Cyden Limited'} Review Text: Wow this SmoothSkin Pure FIT Intelligent Ultrafast IPL Laser is impressive! I’ve had and used IPL lasers in the past but literally none of them were this fast.

This thing is so simple and easy to use; read the booklet, follow the instructions, but all you have to do is plug it in and use it. It’s not complicated it’s actually very easy and simple to use.

You do have to start with a shaved clean skin and then all you have to do is press and hold the button and in speed mode it will continuously flash as long as you move it along the skin. I have found that IPL laser results are effective and long lasting as long as you use this right. Go by the skin tone graph and use it weekly, unless skin irritation develops.

I absolutely love this thing. I like the little cap that it comes with for precision treatment areas such as the face. The cap Is actually magnetic so it stays on very well. My only gripe with this is that for this price, and this was priced at $379 at the time of purchase, you should get a case with this product, but you do not get any protective case just a box that it ships in, that’s kind of disappointing to me but it’s not a dealbreaker because this product produces excellent results. I would highly highly highly recommend this IPL laser in particular just because of the speed and effectiveness of it. I have pretty sensitive skin and after use I did not have any irritation with it. I used it on my face, under arms, bikini area and legs. I could not believe how fast it was and how easy it was to use! Review Title: Impressive Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: U Beauty Preface Kit | Skin Care Gift Value Set with Retinol, Vitamin C Serum Anti-Aging Essentials Skin Tightening Arm Cream + Facial Hyaluronic Acid Morning and Night - 2.7oz (Set of 3) Review Date: 2022/04/03 Store: U Beauty Product Description: ['Our three cult-favorite hero products in an exclusive getaway-ready kit: The essential Travel Trio features the Resurfacing Compound 15ml, SUPER Hydrator 15ml, and SCULPT Arm Compound 50ml.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'U Beauty', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Item Volume': '15 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.33 x 7.87 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '850022804137', 'Manufacturer': 'U Beauty', 'Country of Origin': 'Italy'} Review Text: This amazing skin care set includes a resurfacing compound, a super hydrator and finally a sculpt compound.
This set uses retinol, vitamin C as well as hyaluronic acid to provide skin tightening results for the face, neck and chest areas. This set should last 4 weeks. At $158.00 it seems expensive but I am not sure about long term results yet so I am not sure if it is worth it. Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Marine Forest Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit, 2 Colors in 1 Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils Shaping Kit Reusable, 1 Brush and 1 Razor Review Date: 2022/04/25 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: This eyebrow stamp kit comes with 24 stencils and two colors. The black and brown are pretty dark but exactly as described. I really like this set as it was relatively cheap and you get so much variety with it. I would totally re! Review Title: Eyebrow stamp kit Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: New Soft Hair Curlers Rollers,Heatless Curling Headband for Sleeping, No Heat Ponytail Hairband Hair Curler,Overnight Lazy Scrunchie Rollers Magic DIY Hair Styling Tools for Long Hair (pink) Review Date: 2022/06/18 Store: NexMe Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Number of Items': '1', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Brand': 'NexMe', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '799904670265'} Review Text: Soft, simple and easy to use hair curler. The pink color is pretty too. This will give you natural bedtime curls with little effort. This gets two thumbs up!

You could also use this as a hairstyle too! Review Title: Cute and useful! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan Review Date: 2022/06/21 Store: By Terry Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'} Review Text: Exactly as described/pictured. Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush Review Date: 2022/07/28 Store: L'ANGE HAIR Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"} Review Text: This cute pink comb is perfect for detangling wet hair. I like to use this after the shower, it helps not to pull my fine hair our. But it definitely helps to detangle. This is exactly as described and pictured! Two thumbs up! Review Title: Sturdy Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EMILIE HEATHE - Lip Atelier Lip Color | Sustainable, Cruelty-Free, Clean Beauty (Public) Review Date: 2022/07/28 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Clean', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Specialty': 'Cruelty-free,Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.13 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '810033380181'} Review Text: This is exactly as described and pictured! Two thumbs up! Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Elli K Essential Sincerity From AZ Time Reverse Double Ampoule – Made in USA - Double Layering Serum – Repairing & Deep Hydrating – Oil and Cream Formula for Healthy and Smooth Skin, (2.02 fl.oz.) Review Date: 2022/08/02 Store: ELLI K Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Banana', 'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.93 x 1.73 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174819'} Review Text: This face moisturizer is great! I really like the formula - it uses high quality ingredients to produce high quality results. As for long term results, I don’t know yet but so far I really like this and I would high recommend! Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ELLI K ESSENTIAL SINCERITY FROM AZ TIME REVERSE CREAM - Made in USA - Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer for Dry & Rough Skin – Repairing Treatment Cream – Highly Concentrated Formula, 1.76 oz. Review Date: 2022/08/15 Store: ELLI K Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ELLI K', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba', 'Unit Count': '1.76 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.76 x 2.52 inches; 10.55 Ounces', 'UPC': '841960174826'} Review Text: This anti aging cream arrived quickly and packaged nicely. It uses some very high quality ingredients in order to produce high quality results. I don't know about long term results yet but so far I really like this cream and I would highly recommend. Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL Review Date: 2022/08/23 Store: Beauty Bakerie Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'} Review Text: Exactly as described! Two thumbs up! Arrived quickly and packaged nicely! Review Title: Exactly as described Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Skincare Focus**: Strong inclination towards products targeting skin health and anti-aging, often favoring ingredients like retinol, vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and natural oils.
- **Eye and Brow Products**: Consistent interest in enhancing eyelashes and eyebrows, with multiple purchases indicating a preference for growth and conditioning serums.
- **Ease of Use**: Products noted for their simplicity and effectiveness in application, reflecting a preference for user-friendly solutions in beauty routines.
- **Quality Assurance**: Preference for high-quality, reputable brands with positive reviews, indicating a willingness to invest in skincare and beauty products.
- **Natural Ingredients**: Favoring products with natural formulations, cruelty-free options, and a clean beauty ethos.
- **Hair Care Preferences**: Interest in hair styling tools that minimize damage, as shown by the purchase of heatless curlers and detangling tools.
- **Color & Aesthetic**: A preference for attractive packaging and colors, particularly noted with hair tools and makeup items. 

Overall, this individual demonstrates a strong commitment to enhanced beauty through effective, high-quality products, emphasizing effective results combined with ease of use and a preference for natural ingredients.

target_interaction.title: Exactly as described/pictured
target_interaction.text: Lovely cleansing facial oil. The fact that this is 100% plant based is awesome and comforting that it does not have all those toxic chemicals like others products. I would definitely recommend this, especially for sensitive skin like mine. Two thumbs up!
target_interaction.title_meta: Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz
features: CLEANSES THOROUGHLY - Remove impurities and makeup with our face cleansing oil. This skin-loving oil based makeup remover boasts a luxurious blend of fruit oils that leave your skin fresh, clean, soft and deeply hydrated. Nourishes Intensively, lock in moisture with our facial cleansing oil, rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids (Omega 3, 6 and 9). Its Vitamins E and A help fade dark spots and blemishes. Use this makeup remover regularly to keep your skin luminous and refreshed.

HELPS SOOTHE FACIAL MUSCLES - Pamper yourself with our cleansing facial oil. Thanks to the skin-loving fruit oils of our facial cleanser, you can massage your face to help the muscles relax. Apply it instead of a common makeup remover pack.

IDEAL FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Our face makeup remover cleanser benefits delicate, normal, dry, oily and combination skin types. You can also use this natural makeup remover as a bath oil. It cleanses without clogging pores or stripping your skin’s moisture barrier.

TRULY NATURAL LUXURY - Our products are clean, green, and consciously crafted with wholesome & effective superfoods from Mother Nature's Garden and not formulated in a lab using chemicals you can't pronounce or toxins you don't want on your body. USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC | PETA CERTIFIED VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: Consciously crafted to be good for you, kind to animals, and beneficial for the planet. Proudly made in the USA.

100 DAY RISK FREE GUARANTEE - That's right! Love it or your money back! If you don't love it, we offer a 100 day money-back guarantee with no questions asked. Skin care is self-care and you deserve the best!
